name: Terrarium Builder
description:
Have you ever dreamed about building a terrarium? Do you already have one, but it’s not enough? Or maybe you want to test yourself before making the real one? Terrarium Builder is a game for you! In Terrarium Builder you can design and create realistic terrariums with the following features:

Terrain Sculpting

Sculpt the terrain with different brushes, so that you can achieve the shape that you want.

Terrain Painting

Paint typical surfaces like grass, moss, and the terrain itself.

Decoration placement

Enrich it using a library of prebuilt decorations like: mushrooms, bridges, statues and so on...

Scene customization

Customize the scene as you like.
